name: Vegan Pesto with Basil
description: This vegan pesto with basil is perfect for busy days. It's super easy to make, healthy, and in combination with pasta incredibly delicious. All you need for this vegan pesto is 5 minutes!

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender of food processor.
recipeInstructions.name: Place all of the ingredients in a blender of food processor.

recipeInstructions.text: Process until rather smooth with a few chunks. It's best to use the pulse function. However, make sure not to process the pesto for too long because otherwise it might become bitter.
recipeInstructions.name: Process until rather smooth with a few chunks. It's best to use the pulse function. However, make sure not to process the pesto for too long because otherwise it might become bitter.

keywords: how to make vegan pesto, vegan pesto, vegan pesto recipe
